properties.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued February 4 at 3:27PM CST until February 6 at 3:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
......FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH
THURSDAY AFTERNOON...

.A frontal system will move through our area Wednesday evening and
Thursday evening that will produce heavy rainfall.

The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a

* Flash Flood Watch FOR portions of southeast Mississippi and
southern Mississippi, including the following areas, in
southeast Mississippi, Harrison. In southern Mississippi,
Hancock and Jackson.

* from Wednesday afternoon through Thursday afternoon

* Rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches will be possible with locally
higher amounts.
properties.instruction:
A Flash Flood Watch means that conditions may develop that lead
to flash flooding. Flash flooding is a very dangerous situation.

You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action
should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

NWSheadline: FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON
